author: spandeyehep
body:
This PR mainly concerns the HCAL DQM histogram booking script. 
More details can be found out in the discussion of this[1] RelVal HN thread.

Involves following packages:
DQMOffline/Hcal
Validation/CaloTowers
Validation/HcalHits

[1] https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/relval/10906.html
title: HCAL DQM histogram booking update
